mapper.sql: documents_status_id AS "documentsStatusId", action AS "action", form_status AS "formStatus", form_type AS "formType", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_documents_status where 1 = 1
and documents_status_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.documentsStatusId},'%')
and action like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.action},'%')
and form_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.formStatus},'%')
and form_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.formType},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
